WorkItem.Description: Elemental Precision for mages still reads and acts as the talent only effects frost and fire talents.  This talent now effects all mage spells including arcane.

Comments.Message: Blizzard hasn't updated the tooltip yet; it does function correctly.

It's being applied in rawr correctly. If you hover over your hit rating you'll see a hit value for arcane, if you remove Elemental Precision talent points you'll see that go down (assuming you're not well past the hit cap).

I have tested this out on live. I'm not getting spell misses with a base of 11.09% spell hit,, with the precision talent and the arcane focus talent against the Heroic Training Dummy. Also according to the patch notes release from Blizzard, there was no change to the precision talent. 
WWS report http://wowwebstats.com/bkzt1fryw2a3g

It looks like just the talent description is wrong, when you hover over the talent it says frost and fire spells, but it is actually adding the 3% bonus to arcane spells when I look at the number for spell hit.
